#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
long int gcd(long int a,long int b)
{
  if(a%b==0)
  return b;
  else
  return gcd(b,a%b);
  }
int main()
{
  int t;
  long int n,m;
  scanf("%d",&t);
  while(t--)
  {
    scanf("%ld%ld",&n, &m);
    if(n==1||m==1)
    {
     cout<<max(m,n)<<"\n";
     }
     else
     cout<<gcd(m-1,n-1)+1<<"\n";
     
   }
   return 0;
   }
